class CFExplanationResults[source]

CFExplanationResults(cf_name:str, dataset_name:str, X:DeviceArrayBase, y:DeviceArrayBase, cfs:DeviceArrayBase, total_time:float, pred_fn:Callable[DeviceArrayBase, DeviceArrayBase])

CFExplanationResults(cf_name: str, dataset_name: str, X: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, y: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, cfs: jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase, total_time: float, pred_fn: Callable[[jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase], jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase])

Type Default Details
cf_name str cf method's name
dataset_name str dataset name
X DeviceArrayBase input
y DeviceArrayBase label
cfs DeviceArrayBase generated cf explanation of X
total_time float total runtime
pred_fn typing.Callable[[jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase], jaxlib.xla_extension.DeviceArrayBase] predict function

Test

VanillaCF

{% raw %} 
data_configs = {
    "data_dir": "assets/data/s_adult.csv",
    "data_name": "adult",
    "batch_size": 256,
    'sample_frac': 0.1,
    "continous_cols": [
        "age",
        "hours_per_week"
    ],
    "discret_cols": [
        "workclass",
        "education",
        "marital_status",
        "occupation",
        "race",
        "gender"
    ],
}
m_configs = {
    "sizes": [50, 10, 50],
    'lr': 0.003,
    "dropout_rate": 0.3
}
t_configs = {
    'n_epochs': 20,
    'monitor_metrics': 'val/val_loss'
}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from cfnet.training_module import PredictiveTrainingModule

training_module = PredictiveTrainingModule(m_configs)
dm = TabularDataModule(data_configs)

params, opt_state = train_model(
    training_module, 
    dm, 
    t_configs
)
pred_fn = lambda x: training_module.forward(params, random.PRNGKey(0), x, is_training=False)

cf_exp = VanillaCF({ "n_steps": 1000, 'pred_fn': pred_fn })
cf_res = generate_cf_results_local_exp(cf_exp, dm)

CounterNet

{% raw %} 
m_configs = {
    "enc_sizes": [50,10],
    "dec_sizes": [10],
    "exp_sizes": [50, 50],
    "dropout_rate": 0.3,    
    'lr': 0.003,
    "lambda_1": 1.0,
    "lambda_3": 0.1,
    "lambda_2": 0.2,
}
t_configs = {
    'n_epochs': 100,
    'monitor_metrics': 'val/val_loss'
}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
from cfnet.training_module import CounterNetTrainingModule

cfnet = CounterNetTrainingModule(m_configs)
dm = TabularDataModule(data_configs)

params, opt_state = train_model(
    cfnet, dm, 
    t_configs
)

cf_res = generate_cf_results(cfnet, dm, params, random.PRNGKey(0))
